data.eml:eml: Myrmecophilous pygmephoroid mites (Acari: Pygmephoroidea) associated with Lasius flavus (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) in Russia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khaustov, Alexander A. (2015): Myrmecophilous pygmephoroid mites (Acari: Pygmephoroidea) associated with Lasius flavus (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) in Russia. Zootaxa 4044 (3): 345-370, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4044.3.2
